titleStmt.title: The priests fruits made manifest. And the fashions of the world, and the lust of ignorance: also, a few vvords to the city of London: G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Simmons at the Bull and Mouth neere Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Even page numbers on rectos; p. 7 misnumbered 6.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "ox. A Bishop" immediately following 'G.F'; "Aprill 15.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
